property.name: storm.thrift.transport
property.description: The transport plug-in that used for Thrift client/server communication.

property.name: _storm.thrift.nonsecure.transport
property.description: The transport plug-in that used for non-secure mode for for Thrift client/server communication.

property.name: _storm.thrift.secure.transport
property.description: The transport plug-in that used for secure mode for Thrift client/server communication.

property.name: java.library.path
property.description: This value is passed to spawned JVMs (e.g., Nimbus, Supervisor, and Workers) for the java.library.path value. java.library.path tells the JVM where to look for native libraries. It is necessary to set this config correctly since Storm uses the ZeroMQ and JZMQ native libs.

property.name: nimbus.childopts
property.description: This parameter is used by the storm-deploy project to configure the jvm options for the nimbus daemon.

property.name: worker.childopts
property.description: The jvm opts provided to workers launched by this supervisor. All \"%ID%\" substrings are replaced with an identifier for this worker.

property.name: ui.childopts
property.description: Childopts for Storm UI Java process.

property.name: supervisor.childopts
property.description: This parameter is used by the storm-deploy project to configure the jvm options for the supervisor daemon.

property.name: logviewer.childopts
property.description: Childopts for log viewer java process.

property.name: drpc.childopts
property.description: Childopts for Storm DRPC Java process.

property.name: _storm.min.ruid
property.description: min.user.id is set to the first real user id on the system. If value is 'null' than default value will be taken from key UID_MIN of /etc/login.defs otherwise the specified value will be used for all hosts.
